data.reason: Plan provided by user in conversation

provenance.reason: Plan provided by user in conversation

data.body: Implementation complete: 4 files changed. server.ts: added getNoaaCurrentsSnapshot() following existing pattern, wired into refreshIntegrationSnapshots(). environment.ts: added currentSpeedKnots/currentDirectionDeg fields. ocean.ts: mesh position drift driven by current speed/direction. ConditionsStrip.tsx: added Current pill with cardinal direction. TypeScript compiles clean.

Review: All 4 files match the plan spec. TypeScript compiles clean. API function follows existing getNoaaCoopsSnapshot pattern exactly. Current drift uses mesh position shift (not shader fork) as designed. dt<1 guard prevents tab-inactive jumps. Wrap at 10000 prevents precision drift. degreesToCardinal uses standard 16-point compass. LGTM.
